title: Bedcover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: satin and stem stitch embroidery
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William Randolph Hearst, Jr.
description: Large bedcover of cream-colored linen embroidered in light yellow, yellow-green, blue, rose and white silk. The design is laid out in a central panel with a narrow border at the edge. Central panel has a design in natural scale of symmetrically arranged curving vines ending with flower heads, carnations, tulips, and lilies with occasional birds in the foliage. Borders have a vine pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: linen, silk
Technique: satin and stem stitch embroidery. Gift of Mrs. William Randolph Hearst, Jr.. 1955-103-2.
